start:
Welcome to the SLH MEAH community wallet!

Choose wallet type:
1 Create new wallet (Managed)
2 Import existing wallet (Private Key)
3 Use external wallet (MetaMask / Trust Wallet  address only)

Send 1, 2 or 3.
help:
Available commands:
/start  start
/help  help
/setlang  change language
/balance  check balance
/send <address> <amount>  send tokens
/deposit  get deposit address
/withdraw  withdraw tokens (soon)
/p2p  P2P marketplace (soon)
/donate  info about donations & investment
/community  investors community link
/learn  intro to crypto & DeFi
no_wallet: You don't have a wallet yet. Run /start and choose a wallet type.
import_key:
Send me the private key of the wallet you want to import.
(Not recommended for production, only for development!)
external_address_ask: Send me your wallet address (MetaMask / Trust Wallet).
send_external_block: In external wallet mode the bot cannot send tokens on your behalf.
choose_lang:
Choose language:
 Hebrew  he
 English  en
 Russian  ru
donate_intro: The SLH MEAH project aims to help rebuild Israel's economy and create a human, community-based safety net.
donate_ton:
1 Via TON / Telegram wallet:
Send your donation to:
{{tonAddress}}

A fast, low-fee and decentralized way to transfer value.
donate_evm:
2 Via EVM network (e.g. Bybit, MetaMask, other wallets):
Send your donation to:
{{evmAddress}}

A secure option for those who prefer a known exchange infrastructure.
donate_meah:
Every donor to the project will be rewarded with our internal token MEAH, at a rate of 1 MEAH = 1 ILS (based on the donation value).

Currently rewards are processed manually after verifying the donation. In the future, a fully automatic mechanism will be added.
donate_tax:
Important: in Israel, crypto investments are generally not taxed until profits are converted to ILS. Only when converting to fiat a 'tax event' occurs.

This is not tax or investment advice.
donate_contact:
For questions, guidance or larger investments  you can contact the developer directly:
{{devContact}}
learn_intro: Welcome to a short introduction to crypto and decentralized finance (DeFi).
learn_points:
DeFi allows anyone to be their own bank.
 No central authority can freeze or seize your funds.
 Your wallet is your key to your digital assets  responsibility is yours.
 The SLH MEAH project aims to create a human and economic safety net for Israel.
 The goal: financial freedom, free communication, and a supportive community.
learn_more: More detailed guides, videos and content will be added later, including via a Telegram MiniApp.
